# handleInputModeList(from:with:)

**Instance Method**

Supports interaction with the list of user-enabled keyboards.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func handleInputModeList(from view: UIView, with event: UIEvent)
```

## Discussion

Use this method to launch the input mode list from your input view when the user long-presses or swipes up from the view; advance to the next input mode in the list when the user taps the view.

## Controlling a custom keyboard

- **advanceToNextInputMode()**: Switches to the next keyboard in the list of user-enabled keyboards.
- **dismissKeyboard()**: Dismisses the custom keyboard from the screen.

items.description: Switches to the next keyboard in the list of user-enabled keyboards.

items.description: Dismisses the custom keyboard from the screen.
